subject: Pro plus xpedals
description_text: Hi, I've just taken delivery of my 3 pedal set purchased from you via AliExpress and it came with plain nuts to secure the pedals to the supplied baseplate rather than the T shaped nuts that fit the slots allowing easy adjustments to be made. To move a pedal with the supplied hardware involves me having to take half of my wheel stand apart. Is it possible to get some of the T shaped nuts please? Secondly are you able to tell me when haptica will be configured for Assetto Corsa Rally? Regards Sean Kukula

conversations.body_text: Hi Sean,  Assetto Corsa Rally is compatible with the latest version of SimHub. You can take a photo of it—these standard nuts are usually available locally. If we were to ship them, the shipping cost would be high and it would take a long time.

Thanks for the quick reply, I still had no luck with Sim Hub on that game but it did work on some others so I will have to investigate further.
Are the M6 T nuts just an uindustry standard size? If so I can find some locally.
Lastly are you able to tell me the length of the M6 stand off pillars supplied for the heel rest on the base plate as I wish to get some taller ones but I am now waorking away from home so I am unable to measure them.

Thanks again
Sean Kukula
________________________________
Hi Sean,  The M6 T-nuts are standard parts and very easy to purchase. The standoffs typically have a length of 30–40 mm.
Hi Sean,  The game Assetto Corsa Rally has just been released, so SimHub may not yet support it. However, our pedals are fully compatible and can be used without issue.

Thank you again for your reply, I've managed to make the VAM haptics work via Simhub and sourced some of what I hope to be the correct profile T-nuts, I'm just waiting for some new taller stand offs to arrive and soft of the softer white elastomers then all should be good.
Regards
________________________________
